# UITextItem.Content.link(_:)

**Case**

A link to a resource, such as an item on a remote server or the path to a local file.

## Declaration

```swift
case link(URL)
```

## Parameters

- **link**: The link that the text item represents.

## Getting the content type

- **UITextItem.Content.tag(_:)**: A string that represents a custom tag for a topic.
- **UITextItem.Content.textAttachment(_:)**: A text attachment, such as an image or view.

items.description: A string that represents a custom tag for a topic.
items.name: UITextItem.Content.tag(_:)

items.description: A text attachment, such as an image or view.
items.name: UITextItem.Content.textAttachment(_:)

title: UITextItem.Content.link(_:)
